content: this pattern will guide you in creating a beautiful and functional chemo cap designed with care for those in need of a soft comfortable hat during a challenging time using 100% soft cotton worsted-weight yarn this cap is gentle on the skin and perfect for those experiencing hair loss pattern features 1 easy-to-read crochet pattern 2 uses widely available yarn 3 hook size h-8 5 00 mm 4 video support for unique stitches included in october 2021 i was diagnosed with breast cancer and underwent a mastectomy during my recovery i found comfort in designing chemo caps that were not only practical but uplifting since then i ve created several caps with love and thoughtfulness always keeping softness and style in mind the blossoms of hope cotton chemo cap is a special pattern inspired by my journey and i hope it brings warmth and light to others who may be going through a similar experience copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
